Speaker: Commander Hayes
Text: Intelligence reports a high-value convoy moving through Sector 7. Multiple factions confirmed en route. Secure the cargo and deny enemy acquisition of advanced components.

Speaker: Boss Merchant
Text: Word is there's a juicy convoy packed with Harvester tech rolling through our territory. First team to crack it open gets first pick of the salvage.

Speaker: Dr. Chen
Text: Fresh Harrower debris detected in Grid 12-Alpha. Energy signatures suggest intact weapon systems. Retrieve samples for immediate analysis.

Speaker: Scholar Vex
Text: A Skimmer wreck has surfaced in the southern wastes. Our instruments detect unusual neural processor activity. Investigate and secure any active components.

Speaker: Captain Martinez
Text: Civilian settlement under threat from raiders. Multiple families at risk. Establish defensive perimeter and ensure safe evacuation routes remain open.

Speaker: Road Captain Stone
Text: Our convoy's stuck for repairs, and the vultures are circling. Need security until the engines are back online. Payment in fuel and safe passage rights.

Speaker: Broker Nash
Text: Client needs discrete retrieval of specific personnel from contested territory. High-value target with corporate bounty. Payment on delivery, no questions asked.

Speaker: Director Kane
Text: Long-range sensors have located a sealed Harvester facility. Preliminary scans suggest Alien-tier technology within. Breach and secure all artifacts.

Speaker: Elder Thorne
Text: The Black Vault's deeper levels have opened. Something is transmitting from within. We must reach it before the others do.

Speaker: Lieutenant Cross
Text: Unknown energy signatures detected in the northern sectors. Deploy and gather intelligence on potential new Harvester activity.

Speaker: Trader Yuen
Text: High-value cargo needs escort through bandit territory. Multiple faction interests make this run particularly dangerous. Guards get equal share of profits.

Speaker: Researcher Volk
Text: Field testing required for new Hybrid prototype weapons. Live combat data essential for further development. Volunteers will receive advanced equipment.

Speaker: Director Kane
Text: Intelligence reports Directorate convoy carrying military-grade components. Intercept and acquire for our research programs. Expect heavy resistance.

Speaker: Scholar Vex
Text: Vultures Union convoy spotted with ancient artifacts. These relics belong in our archives, not sold to the highest bidder. Retrieve them.

Speaker: Boss Merchant
Text: Corporate Combine thinks they own every wreck site. Time to remind them that salvage belongs to whoever gets there first.

Speaker: Road Captain Stone
Text: Free 77 mercs are hitting civilian supply routes. Show these hired guns that the roads have protectors.

Speaker: Commander Hayes
Text: Archivists have captured one of our intelligence assets. Extract our operative before they break operational security.

Speaker: Broker Nash
Text: Client wants us to beat the Corporate Combine to a newly discovered vault. First team in gets the contract bonus. Move fast.
